attributes.action: Re-introduce the Death Penalty for murder until any alternative deterant can be proven to be adequately effective.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In light of recent events. it is clear that a culture, with a total disregard for human life is developing in this country. 

Despite legislation making firearms illegal, gun crimes are on the increase. A five year prison sentance is no deterant for carrying firearms, and likely to force the offenders to be ever more younger. 

In the current gang culture, receiving a custodial sentance with parole for "good" behaviour is more of a badge of honour than a meaningful deterant.

The death sentance may be considered by many as not humane, and not an ideal solution.  But until alternative methods can be developed to protect the decent, innocent people of this nation, and keep gun toting, mindless murdering gang thugs off of our streets, it is the ONLY solution.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
